title: Best Beef and Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '450g braising beef steak, cut into 2.5cm cubes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 large sticks celery, chopped', '2 large carrots, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried coriander', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1.8 litres chicken stock', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '385g dry lentils', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated or to taste']
